mip.description: ScenarioMIP simulates climate outcomes based on alternative plausible future scenarios.
mip.keywords: climate, modelling, climate change, future, scenario, high forcing, low forcing, medium forcing, overshoot scenarios, 1.5°C, Paris COP21 Agreement
mip.label: ScenarioMIP
mip.rationale: (a) Facilitating integrated research on the impact of plausible future scenarios over physical and human systems, and on mitigation and adaptation options; (b) addressing targeted studies on the effects of particular forcings in collaboration with other MIPs; (c) help quantifying projection uncertainties based on multi-model ensembles and emergent constraints.

ssp370.description: Gap: Baseline scenario with a medium to high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP7.0 global forcing pathway with SSP3 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 7.0 W/m2 in 2100.  Concentration-driven.
ssp370.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP3, RCP7.0, future, Medium-high forcing, Gap: Baseline
ssp370.long_name: gap-filling scenario reaching 7.0 based on SSP3
ssp370.rationale: The scenario represents the medium to high end of plausible future pathways. SSP3-7.0 fills a gap in the CMIP5 forcing pathways that is particularly important because it represents a forcing level common to several (unmitigated) SSP baselines.

ssp245.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately RCP4.5 global forcing pathway with SSP2 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 4.5 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
ssp245.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP2, RCP4.5, future,  Medium forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp245.long_name: update of RCP4.5 based on SSP2
ssp245.rationale: The scenario represents the medium part of the range of plausible future pathways.

ssp434.description: Gap: Mitigation scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately RCP3.4 global forcing pathway with SSP4 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 3.4 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
ssp434.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP4, RCP3.4, future,  Low forcing, Gap: Mitigation
ssp434.long_name: gap-filling scenario reaching 3.4 based on SSP4
ssp434.rationale: The scenario fills a gap at the low end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.  Of interest to mitigation policy, since mitigation costs differ substatially between forcing levels of 4.5 W/m2 and 2.6 W/m2.

sspXY.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with very-low forcing by the end of the century.  Forcing will be substantially beolow RCP2.6 in 2100. SSP1-2.0 is a likely candidate for this scenario.
sspXY.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSPX, RCPY, low forcing, probably SSP1, RCP around or below 2.0
sspXY.rationale: There is policy interest in scenarios that would inform a possible goal of limiting global mean warming to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels based on the Paris COP21 agreement.

ssp534-over.description: Gap: Mitigated overshoot scenario with medium/low radiative forcing by the end of the 21st century.  The scenario follows SSP5-8.5, an unmitigated baseline scenario, through 2040, and then substantially negative net emissions thereafter.
ssp534-over.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP3.4, RCP8.5, overshoot, future, SSP-based RCP
ssp534-over.long_name: RCP3.4 overshoot scenario branching from SSP58.5
ssp534-over.rationale: Explore the climate science and policy implications of a peak and decline in forcing during the 21st century.  This scenario fills a gap in existing climate simulations by investigating the implications of a substantial 21st century overshoot in radiative forcing relative to a longer-term target.

ssp460.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately RCP6.0 global forcing pathway with SSP1 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 6.0 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
ssp460.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP4, RCP6.0, future, Medium forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp460.long_name: update of RCP6.0 based on SSP4
ssp460.rationale: The scenario fills in the range of medium forcing plausible future pathways. The scenario defines the low end of the forcing range for unmitigated SSP baseline scenarios.

ssp126.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately RCP2.6 global forcing pathway with SSP1 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 2.6 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
ssp126.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP1, RCP2.6, future, Low forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp126.long_name: update of RCP2.6 based on SSP1
ssp126.rationale: The scenario represents the low end of the range of plausible future pathways. The scenario depicts the "best case" future from the sustainability perspective.

ssp585.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway with SSP5 socioeconomic conditions. Concentration-driven.
ssp585.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP8.5, future, High forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp585.long_name: update of RCP8.5 based on SSP5
ssp585.rationale: The scenario represents the high end of plausible future pathways. SSP5 is the only SSP with emissions high enough to produce the 8.5 W/m2 level of forcing in 2100.

rcpYForcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway Y, future, 21st century, SSPX, RCPY
rcpYForcing.label: RCPY Forcing

rcp34overForcing.description: Impose RCP3.4 overshoot forcing.  Beginning in 2040, reduce forcings from the 8.5 W/m2 pathway to 3.4 W/m2 by 2100.
rcp34overForcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP3.4 overshoot
rcp34overForcing.label: RCP34 overshoot Forcing

AOGCMconfiguration.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
AOGCMconfiguration.label: AOGCM Configuration

rcp85Forcing.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
rcp85Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
rcp85Forcing.label: RCP85 Forcing

HistoricalInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
HistoricalInitialisation.label: HistoricalInitialisation

rcp70Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0
rcp70Forcing.label: RCP70 Forcing

60yrs2040-2099.description: Scenario, from 2040 to the end of the 21st century.
60yrs2040-2099.label: 2040-2099 60 yrs

FutureSolarParticleForcing.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
FutureSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
FutureSolarParticleForcing.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

rcp26Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6
rcp26Forcing.label: RCP26 Forcing

ssp5-85Initialisation2040.description: Initialisation is from year 2040 of the SSP5-8.5 experiment.
ssp5-85Initialisation2040.label: SSP5-85Initialisation2040

NineMemberEnsemble.description: An ensemble of nine members (if not 9, then as many as possible).
NineMemberEnsemble.label: NineMember

rcp34Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4, future, 21st century, SSP4, RCP3.4
rcp34Forcing.label: RCP34 Forcing

rcp60Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 6.0, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP6.0
rcp60Forcing.label: RCP60 Forcing

rcp45Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5, future, 21st century, SSP2, RCP4.5
rcp45Forcing.label: RCP45 Forcing

86yrs2015-2100.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
86yrs2015-2100.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

FutureSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
FutureSolarIrradiance.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
FutureSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
FutureSolarIrradiance.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMI.description: An overview of the CMIP6 solar forcing dataset (irradiance as well as particle-related parameters) and guidelines for their usage.
SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMI.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
